entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow mixed with rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain mixed with snow in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
